endpoint

Class MessageDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • endpoint.MessageDecoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.websocket.Decoder, javax.websocket.Decoder.Text<ChatMessage>

    public class MessageDecoder
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.websocket.Decoder.Text<ChatMessage>
    This class handles the incoming message from the MyServerEndpoint Class. In fact, it DECODES the messages in a "ChatMessage" istance from an incoming JSON string. Be aware: this decoder is similar to the client correspective.
    Author:
    Stefano Belli *
